message: Tried searching for Austin and Houston, both of which have groups here.  Neither showed up...  By design or is something wrong?

And not for me -- https://convore.com/search/?q=houston  I'm using the global search up at the top, not the specific one under /discover/.  I'd recommend making the top one cover both cases if possible.
I always assume that a top level search will search the entire site.
This was a point of confusion for me as well when I first joined.
Thanks for clearing that up for me. I was searching using the Global search and not the one under "discover" and I agree the global should work just like the other.
same here, I was sure it was just broken
